name: Surrounded by zombies
description:
Surrounded by zombies - is a first-person shooter with horror elements.

A few years ago, zombies appeared on earth. The reason for their origin was unknown.
It was assumed that they appeared due to an unknown virus or an unsuccessful scientific experiment.
After several years of research and search for information, the military group managed to obtain information about the origin of the zombies.
They delivered all the information they received by helicopter. However, on the way to the base, the helicopter crashed.
You are one of the military, your task is to find helicopters and pick up information. The forest is full of zombies.
Look for villages where you can find ammunition and medicine. You can save the game by the fires.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Interesting gameplay.
